sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function TermsOfUse() { return (

Terms Of Use

  • Home
  • Terms Of Use

Welcome to the NFT - Marketplace Terms of Use agreement. For purposes of this agreement, “Site” refers to the Company’s website, which can be accessed at NFT - Marketplace “Service” refers to the Company’s services accessed via the Site, in which users can create non-fungible tokens on the Ethereum Blockchain and upload user-created content to our servers and other third party affiliates. In these terms "we," "us," and "our" refer to the Company. "You" refers to you, as a user of our Site or our Service.

Accessing or using the service you agree to these terms of use If you do not agree, you may not access or use the Service.

  • You are allowing us, our affiliates, and partners to use the content you submit.
  • You have all the required rights to grant or deny the use of terms.
  • You should be at least 13 years of age, to use our website and its services.

Privacy Policy

We respect the privacy of its service users. Please refer to the Privacy Policy, which explains how we collect, use, and disclose information.

Service

Our Service allows you to create non-fungible tokens and upload user-created content to our servers, manage existing non-fungible tokens existing on our server or made on other third-party services, you can sell & buy items, create a store, and more.

If you are new and you sign up for the service, you will create a personalized account that includes a unique username and a password to access the service and to receive messages from the Company. The Company will not be responsible for any liabilities, losses, or damages arising out of the unauthorized use of your member name, password, and/or account.

Restrictions

To use our service or permission to use our site is conditioned upon the following use, posting, and conduct restrictions.

You agree that in no event shall the Service, its officers, directors, employees, contractors, affiliates, or agents be liable to you or any third party for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential damages or any damages incurred by you.

Any loss or damage that may be incurred by you arising out of or in any way connected with the use or performance of the Website; the delay or inability to use the Website. The limitations on the service’s liability apply even if the service has been advised of or should have been aware of the possibility that such losses or damages could arise.

Conduct Restrictions

When you create your personalized store, you may be able to generate content in the form of non-fungible from using the Service. You are responsible for the user content that you post, upload, link.

You agree that we are only acting as a platform for your online distribution and publication of your content. However, we have the right to remove any content if it doesn't follow our conditions.

Disclaimer

The Website, Content, and Services are provided without any guarantees, conditions as to its accuracy, quality, and fit for a particular purpose or need. The Company does not guarantee that the Website and Services are error-free, or will operate without interruption. We are not in charge of any substance of outside sites that are connected to our pages.

Use of Third-party Services

While using the website or the Services, you may be offered services, products, and promotions provided by third parties. If you decide to use these third-party services, you do so at your own risk and are solely responsible for reviewing, understanding, and complying with the associated terms and conditions. We expressly disclaim any liability for the third-party services and are not responsible for the performance of the third-party services or services.

) } export default TermsOfUse
